recipesJson.name: Hop Along Sally
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description:
An easy 1-2-3 Hoppy Citrus mix.

Credit to eyemakepizza and ID10-T for the remaining pieces!

reviews.text: Been looking for a recipe that goes well with beer, and this is the best one I have tried. The hops has a slight citrus note that is further enhanced by the tangerine, and the honeysuckle brings the sweetness and funkyness. It's wierd, but good wierd. Love stuff like this.

This is a lovely little mix. The tangerine is a nice, bright burst of citrus in a bed of lush, juicy and sweet (thanks honeysuckle) hops. This is what a craft beer should taste like. I'd drain a sixer of this like I drained the bottle I made. 10ml gone in under 48 hours, and in a MTL tank. Sooo damned good!

Just mixed this a minute ago, and my first impressions are quite promising...Strong flavor for a low percentage mix, and I'm digging the simple citrus flavor.  I'm finding that I really love Yakima Hops, which is the main reason I chose to mix.  Nice blend!
